overview:
Tony Diehl Leader in Internet Marketing & Social Media: CEO @ Stickable Media | Art & Music Enthusiast | Entrepreneur | & #1 DAD

CEO / Founder at Stickable Media | We Make Your Brand STICK with Consumers Through Internet Marketing & Social Media Learn more & sign up for a FREE Strategy Session at StickableMedia.com Connect at Facebook.com/StickableMedia

Co-Owner at Brand New Likes - Facebook Sweepstakes App | The Easiest Way to Drive New Market-Relative LIKES to Your Brand Facebook Page Learn more & see a LIVE example at BrandNewLikes.com

Manager for Nick Andrew Staver | Blues Musician based in Philadelphia, PA Nick is a modern blues spirit who writes, records and performs original songs with passion and pride. Nick incorporates elements of blues, jazz and rock with his iconic vocal style to meld a sound that stirs images of Van Morrison, Otis Redding & Eric Clapton. Listen & Download FREE Tunes at NickAndrewStaver.com

Assistant Business Director & LIVE Music Director for Post Now PA | Promoting Cultural & Economic Development in South Central PA PNPA is an arts organization and administer of The Thought Lot contemporary arts center in Shippensburg, PA. Post Now PA produces art exhibits, music events, theatre productions, The Earl literary magazine, the Thoughtful Farmers Market & more! Learn more at PostNowPA.com & TheThoughtLot.com

Learn more about Tony at TonyDiehl.com
